alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:39AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield and northern Westchester Counties through 830 AM EDT... At 739 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bedford, or near Mount Kisco, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bedford around 745 AM EDT. Norwalk around 805 AM EDT. New Canaan around 810 AM EDT. Ridgefield and Wilton around 820 AM EDT. Westport and Weston around 825 AM EDT. Fairfield and Redding around 830 AM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
